title: Seth Moulton and the future of the Democratic Party
description: Rep. Seth Moulton (D-Mass.) has a resume that seems custom built for higher office. The young congressman sat down with Chuck and talked about what Moulton, a Marine Corps veteran, had learned about leadership while serving overseas.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
